messages.subject: Re: New Shinsengumi drama
messages.msgSnippet: Awww shucks, too bad the gentlemen aren t as good-looking, in my opinion, as the NHK Shinsengumi.  Now those guys were like walking lolly-pops! I m still
messages.messageBody:
Awww shucks, too bad the gentlemen aren't as good-looking, in my
opinion, as the NHK Shinsengumi. Now those guys were like walking
lolly-pops! I'm still trying to cool off from watching that series.

Alright, enough about lust and the like. I'd love to get my hands on
a subbed version of this "Wachigaiya Itosato" that is coming up...
Even though... LOL



--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@...>
wrote:
>
> On September 9th & 10, TBS (in Japan) will be airing "Wachigaiya
Itosato," based on the novel by Asada Jiro.
>
> The official site is at http://www.tbs.co.jp/itosato/
>
> Information in English http://wiki.d-
addicts.com/Wachigaiya_Itosato
>
> Given the interest in the 2004 taiga on the Shinsengumi, I'm sure
someone will be uploading the raw video to d-addicts.
>
> phil
>

new Car Finder tool.

messages.subject: New Shinsengumi drama
messages.msgSnippet: On September 9th & 10, TBS (in Japan) will be airing Wachigaiya Itosato, based on the novel by Asada Jiro. The official site is at
messages.messageBody:
On September 9th & 10, TBS (in Japan) will be airing "Wachigaiya Itosato," based on the novel by Asada Jiro.

The official site is at http://www.tbs.co.jp/itosato/

Information in English http://wiki.d-addicts.com/Wachigaiya_Itosato

Given the interest in the 2004 taiga on the Shinsengumi, I'm sure someone will be uploading the raw video to d-addicts.

phil
